title: Ubisoft Announces Assassin's Creed Infinite - Kinda Funny Games Daily 07.07.21
description:
Blessing and Tim talk about the new Assassin's Creed live service shift, Robocop, and more!

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:04:12 - Housekeeping
A new Gamescast is up right now and it’s us looking through every major game release for the rest of the year. That’s me, Tim, Andy, and Greg and is up on Youtube and podcast services around the globe.
Kinda Funny’s Loki episode 5 reactions just finished recording and should be up on Youtube.com/KindaFunny by the time you’re listening to this.
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Donavan Harkness & Black Jack
The Roper Report  -
00:05:37 - Assassin’s Creed is turning into a live service
00:35:50 - Ad
00:38:00 - RoboCop’s getting a new video game - Michael McWhertor @ Polygon
00:40:30 - HBO's The Last of Us Season 1 Will Have 10 Episodes - Adele Ankers @ IGN
00:48:48 - Destiny 2 Showcase has been announced For August 24 - Jon Bitner @ TheGamer
00:50:00 - Out today
 Reader mail  -
00:51:40 - Do you think with Halo Infinite being maybe the biggest game coming this fall, does it have more pressure to be great by us (fans, media, etc)? - BJ Bernardo
00:56:00 - Squad Up:Neil(XBOX & PS)
00:57:00 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Greg and Tim
